short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Now you're just one click away from your gmail inbox!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension does one thing and one thing only: it gets you to your gmail with just a single click! Great for people who want to stop typing 'gmail' over and over again into the chrome search bar only to be sent to a results page instead of their inbox.
